interpretation:
The Upwards Button represents a desire for progress and advancement. This card indicates that you are ready to move forward in your life and are willing to take the necessary steps to make positive changes. It is a sign of ambition and determination, encouraging you to strive for success and reach new heights.

This card may also indicate that you are in the process of making important decisions that will impact your future. It advises you to trust your instincts and take a leap of faith, even if it means leaving your comfort zone.

The Upwards Button reminds you that change is necessary for growth, and sometimes you need to take a risk to achieve your goals. Be open to new opportunities and embrace the unknown, as they may lead you to unexpected and exciting places.

In a relationship reading, this card may indicate that you and your partner are ready to take your relationship to the next level. It is a sign of progress and improvement, encouraging you to work together towards a brighter future.

Overall, the Upwards Button is a positive card that represents growth and progress. It reminds you that you have the power to shape your future and encourages you to take action towards your goals.
